summary:
Adds two craftable swords from two fantasy rangers.
The Gondorian Blade-used by Gondorian Rangers
Longclaw-used by Jon Snow
descriptionHtml:
Swords Of The Rangers
-----------------------------
Adds two craftable swords from two fantasy rangers.
------------------------------------------------------------------
The Gondorian Blade-used by Gondorian Rangers
-----------------------------------------------------------
Longclaw-used by Jon Snow
---------------------------------
Information
---------------
Both are craftable under the glass section of the forge for a variety of materials,
and both and have high stats and speed.
I play with OCS, Warzones, Deadly Dragons, Sky MoMod, Mo spawns, Monster wars, so the stats may be a bit high for some of you.
------------------------------------------
Installation
--------------
Extract and place both the gondorian blade esp, the longclaw esp and meshes and textures in the skyrim data folder 
---------------------------
Credits
----------
This Tutorial For a Great helping Hand (Great for New Modders):
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16985
George R. R. Martin\'s for a great series of books
J. R. R. Tolkien for more great books.
For use in the screenshots:
LOTR Shield pack by Lancelotx999
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12045
Omegared99 - Armor Compilation by Omegared99
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10277
Nights Watch Armor by trinkof
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16741
Cloaks of Skyrim by Noodles
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12092

SDD707
author: SDD707
